r.s: Generic date/time handling class for PEAR
r.d: Generic classes for representation and manipulation of dates, times and time zones without the need of timestamps, which is a huge limitation for PHP programs. Includes time zone data, time zone conversions and many date/time conversions. It does not rely on 32-bit system date stamps, so you can display calendars and compare dates that date pre 1970 and post 2038.
r.n:
QA release. Users are strongly encouraged to adopt to inbuilt DateTime functionality.
